description: A push button that "snaps in", i.e. it is selected when pressed and deselected when pressed again.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

alignment.description: The horizontal alignment of the button text.

image.description: An image to be displayed on the button.

checked.description: The checked state of the toggle button.

checkedChanged.description: Fired when the checked property changes.

value.description: The new value of the `checked` property.

select.description: Fired when the toggle button is selected or deselected by the user.
